Body: Like a lot of other owners of Samsung S5 smartphones, I had a lot of trouble and difficulty with my phone after installing the lolipop update. lollipop isn't working well with my phone, so my question is: Who's fault is it for that huge mistake? Is it Google or is it Samsung, because I didn't see such problems for manufacturers other than Samsung.
Title: Whose fault is it? Google's or Samsung's?

history.Text: As a lot of other owners of Samsung S5 smartphones, I too had a lot of troubles and difficulty whit my phone after installing update. New Andriod 5.0 lollipop isn't working well at all, so my question is: Who's fault is it for that huge mistake? Is it Google or is it Samsung, because I didn'n seen much troubles for some other manufacturers other than Samsung. Worst troubles had and still have Nexus and Samsung S5, as I understood.
Whos fault is it? Google's or Samsung's?
